It's unclear if this is a JDT or JFace text problem. Erich, can you or Kai take 
a look?

this shows up on GTK only and I've never seen a bug like this on Win or Motif.
The crash is in SWT Color.getRed so I don't think that the Text editor is the 
culprit.

Somebody with GTK know how might be in a better position to understand what has 
happened.

Moving to SWT

Created an attachment (id=313)
log from eclipse himself, cause a internal error

I have add a new logfile.
I think it's has to do with they problem.

I have open a java-source and a error-message in the task-view.
I click on the message and the "internal-error-window" is openend and the
added logfile is created.

I use the gtk-version 20020205
Verified: Doesn't happen in recent 2.0 builds.
Both the erase-background-on-repaint and focus, have been fixed in 2.0.
